Name: Regret
Rule Change: //note: this should execute swaps in a random order; to make things more interesting! to demonstrate; snowball becomes fireball if swaps are executed in the order wisp>nitrogen>marshmallow; or becomes energy ball if the order is nitrogen>wisp>marshmallow; or dust ball if the order is nitrogen>wisp>marshmallow. also uh is this supposed to be an actual rule or just an episode constraint; i am the dumb
